raw_comment:
What do you notice?
That in every major sports league the ratio of players of color to coaches of color is at best 1.5-1 and at worst almost 7-1
What do you wonder?
I wonder how sports with players of color lack head coaches or managers because it could generally be assumed that they are a large part of the sport so why aren't they more prominent in coaching positions.
What impact does this have on you and your community?
Memphis has had a coach of color before and I was not aware that it was so rare and I think that with a lot of players of color on Memphis' college and professional league teams it is important there is representation in management as well.
